property.value: Deck Size: 30. Deckbulding Options: Survivor cards (ξ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Neither Rain nor Snow, 1 copy of Called by the Mists, 1 random basic weakness.

property.value: θ Spend 1 resource: You get +1 ή for this skill test. θ Spend 1 resource: You get +1 ί for this skill test.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Do not reveal chaos tokens for the next skill test you perform this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when an investigator at your location draws a non-weakness treachery card. Test ά (3). If you succeed, cancel that card's revelation effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-Elite enemy. Place that enemy on top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test. You get +1 to each of your skills for the remainder of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after a skill test you failed ends (after resolving all effects from the failed test). Attempt that test again. You get +2 skill value for this test.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while investigating. Discover 2 clues in your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 2 or less while attacking an enemy engaged with you. Deal this attack's damage to a different enemy at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Max 1 committed per skill test. You may commit Take Heart to any type of test. If this test fails, the performing investigator draws 2 cards and gains 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less while investigating. Discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test by 3 or less during an evasion attempt against a non-Elite enemy. Place that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. During or before your first action of each of your turns, each skill test you perform gets +1 difficulty. During or after your third action of each of your turns, each skill test you perform gets -1 difficulty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. In between two scenarios of a campaign, reduce the experience cost to repurchase up to 3 cards that you exiled during the last scenario by 1 each.
